name: Book of Hours
maker: Masters of Dirc van Delf, Attributed to Johannes de Malborch
description: Book of Hours; Masters of Dirc van Delf (Dutch, active about 1400 - about 1410), Attributed to Johannes de Malborch; Utrecht (probably), Netherlands; about 1405 - 1410; Tempera colors, gold leaf, and ink on parchment bound between wood boards covered with purple velvet; Leaf: 16.5 × 11.7 cm (6 1/2 × 4 5/8 in.); Ms. 40; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Book of Hours
medium: Tempera colors, gold leaf, and ink on parchment bound between wood boards covered with purple velvet
